pages.text: This powerful Rite teleports anything in its vicinity to a target location.$(br2)This Rite works really well with $(l:bewitchment:tools/waystone)Waystones$(), as it allows teleporting entities in remote places.
Any location holder (e.g. a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$() or a $(item)Waystone$()) may be used for this.$(br)If a Taglock is used, it must be bound to an entity.
